name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash Cards : Periodic Table of Elements

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flash Cards for the student of the Periodic Table of the Elements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Periodic Table of Elements Study Cards is designed for the student learning the Atomic numbers and Chemical Symbols of the elements.  Questions and answers are presented in an electronic version of the traditional notecard study method.

Read the question, respond with your answer and then flip the card to see if you were correct.

Once you've completed a pass of all of the cards you can reset the deck to start again.
